title: PAD-US 4.1 Marine - Marine Protected Areas
description: Marine protected areas from PAD-US 4.1, containing 1,739 features representing coastal and offshore waters under some degree of protection. Includes National Marine Sanctuaries, Marine National Monuments, and other federal and state marine protected areas around the U.S. coastline and territories. Managed by USGS Gap Analysis Project (GAP). Indexed by H3 hexagons at resolution 10 (~15m² cells).
license_other: Public Domain (U.S. Government Work) - Not subject to copyright protection within the United States (17 U.S.C. § 105). International rights may apply.

links.title: Detailed Data Documentation and Usage Examples

geoparquet.title: GeoParquet file with 1,739 marine protected areas
geoparquet.description: Cloud-native GeoParquet format optimized for analytical queries. Use with DuckDB, Polars, pandas, or any GeoParquet-compatible tool. Geometries in EPSG:4326.

pmtiles.title: PMTiles for web mapping
pmtiles.description: Pyramid of map tiles in PMTiles format. Supports zoom levels 0-14 for efficient web map rendering.

h3-parquet.title: H3 hex-indexed parquet files
h3-parquet.description: Parquet files partitioned by H3 cell at resolution 10 (~15m²). Partitioned by h0 for efficient spatial queries.

table:columns.name: _cng_fid
table:columns.description: Cloud-native geometry feature ID. Unique identifier for each marine protected area feature.

table:columns.name: FeatClass
table:columns.description: Feature class. Always 'Marine' for this layer.

table:columns.name: Category
table:columns.description: GAP stewardship category: 'Federal Land', 'State Land', or other applicable category.

table:columns.name: Own_Type
table:columns.description: Owner type code: FED (Federal), STAT (State), LOC (Local), NGO (Non-Governmental Organization).

table:columns.name: Own_Name
table:columns.description: Owner name. Agency holding jurisdiction over the marine area (e.g., NOAA, U.S. Navy).

table:columns.name: Loc_Own
table:columns.description: Local owner name in local terminology when different from Own_Name.

table:columns.name: Mang_Type
table:columns.description: Manager type code. Indicates the type of entity responsible for management.

table:columns.name: Mang_Name
table:columns.description: Manager name. Agency responsible for management (e.g., NOAA Office of National Marine Sanctuaries).

table:columns.name: Loc_Mang
table:columns.description: Local manager name in local terminology.

table:columns.name: Des_Tp
table:columns.description: Designation type code (e.g., 'NMS' for National Marine Sanctuary, 'MPA' for Marine Protected Area).

table:columns.name: Loc_Ds
table:columns.description: Local designation name.

table:columns.name: Unit_Nm
table:columns.description: Unit name. Official name of the marine protected area.

table:columns.name: Loc_Nm
table:columns.description: Local or alternative name.

table:columns.name: State_Nm
table:columns.description: State name. Two-letter postal abbreviation. May include offshore territories.

table:columns.name: Agg_Src
table:columns.description: Aggregator source organization.

table:columns.name: GIS_Src
table:columns.description: GIS source dataset name.

table:columns.name: Src_Date
table:columns.description: Source date in YYYYMMDD or YYYY format.

table:columns.name: GIS_Acres
table:columns.description: GIS-calculated area in acres.

table:columns.name: Source_PAID
table:columns.description: Source Protected Area ID.

table:columns.name: WDPA_Cd
table:columns.description: World Database on Protected Areas site code.

table:columns.name: Pub_Access
table:columns.description: Public access code: OA (Open Access), RA (Restricted Access), XA (Closed), UK (Unknown).

table:columns.name: Access_Src
table:columns.description: Source of the public access information.

table:columns.name: Access_Dt
table:columns.description: Date the public access status was determined.

table:columns.name: GAP_Sts
table:columns.description: GAP Status Code: '1'=Permanent biodiversity primary; '2'=Permanent biodiversity primary/major; '3'=Permanent multiple uses; '4'=No known biodiversity mandate.

table:columns.name: GAPCdSrc
table:columns.description: Source document used to assign the GAP Status Code.

table:columns.name: GAPCdDt
table:columns.description: Date the GAP Status Code was assigned.

table:columns.name: IUCN_Cat
table:columns.description: IUCN Protected Area Management Category: Ia, Ib, II, III, IV, V, or VI.

table:columns.name: IUCNCtSrc
table:columns.description: Source document used to assign the IUCN Category.

table:columns.name: IUCNCtDt
table:columns.description: Date the IUCN Category was assigned.

table:columns.name: Date_Est
table:columns.description: Date the marine protected area was formally established.

table:columns.name: Comments
table:columns.description: Additional information or notes.

table:columns.name: SHAPE_Length
table:columns.description: Perimeter length in meters (original CRS).

table:columns.name: SHAPE_Area
table:columns.description: Area in square meters (original CRS). Use GIS_Acres for comparisons.

table:columns.name: SHAPE
table:columns.description: Geometry in WKB format, EPSG:4326 (WGS84). Typically MULTIPOLYGON.

table:columns.name: bbox
table:columns.type: struct<xmin: double, ymin: double, xmax: double, ymax: double>
table:columns.description: Bounding box in EPSG:4326.
